name: Lich's Mansion II
description:
Created for Global Game Jam 2022 - "Duality"

hosted by the Portland Indie Game Squad

code by Tim Volpe (LZorro)

art by Thomas Ohashi

music by Phil Walsh (jirapher)

created using Game Boy Studio v3.0.3

You are a zombie, able to exist in both the worlds of the living and the dead.  You are charged by your lich master to keep a group of teenagers that have broken in to his mansion from escaping before midnight!  What nefarious purpose lies in store for these hapless souls?

How to play:

  • Enter to Start
  • Arrow keys / WASD for movement
  • Alt / Z / J for A (interact)
  • Ctrl / K / X for B (swap view between living and dead)
